name: SadAssistant
0:
”Alexa ask Sad Assistant to insult me”
”Alexa ask Sad Assistant to roast me”
”Alexa ask Sad Assistant to throw some shade”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sad assistant
des:
Sad Assistant is a first attempt at a skill using Amazon Web Services Alexa's Skills Kit API version 2.0. She features limited, but humorous, responses.

Sad Assistant is a companion persona that lives alongside Alexa. Sad Assistant has the ability to randomly pull from her bank of insults and spit them out at you. 

Try invoking Sad Assistant using one of the examples below or those listed in the Example Phrases Section : 

1) Alexa, ask Sad Assistant to give me an insult.

2) Alexa, ask Sad Assistant got any jabs?

3)Alexa, tell Sad Assistant to play despacito. 


This skill is still being worked on and shall receive periodic updates


Sad Assistant demonstrates my first attempt at creating an Alexa skill using AWS's Alexa Skills Kit API V2.0. More features are to be added to Sad Assistant as well as a host of other companion personas for use in various home automation applications.

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
